content: Alone we can do so little. Together we can do so much.

content: We cannot achieve more in life than what we believe in our heart of hearts we deserve to have.

content: You will never find time for anything. If you want time you must make it.

content: If you think your boss is stupid, remember: You wouldn't have a job if he was any smarter.

content: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.

content: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.

content: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
